sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.GetEmbeddedScreensMasterItemTable</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>GetEmbeddedScreensMasterItemTable</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var GetEmbeddedScreensMasterItemTable = Class.create();
GetEmbeddedScreensMasterItemTable.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    getMasterItemTableName: function() {
        var embeddedScreenId = this.getParameter('sysparm_embedded_screen_id');
        var embeddedScreenGR = new GlideRecord('sys_sg_screen');
        if (!embeddedScreenGR.canRead()) {
            MobileMessageUtil.addSecurityErrorForTable('sys_sg_screen');
            return "";
        }

        embeddedScreenGR.get(embeddedScreenId);
        if (!embeddedScreenGR.isValidRecord()) {
            gs.error("Invalid embedded screen id");
            var errorMessage = gs.getMessage("Invalid embedded screen id");
            gs.addErrorMessage(errorMessage);
            return "";
        }

        return embeddedScreenGR.parent.table;
    },
    type: 'GetEmbeddedScreensMasterItemTable'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-02-21 15:34:07</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>8b05ceabb7501300897725cbde11a971</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>GetEmbeddedScreensMasterItemTable</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Mobile plugin" source="com.glide.sg">0ced34cb6d2220100acb70b3534330d3</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8b05ceabb7501300897725cbde11a971</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-01-25 05:33:16</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>891</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
